description: The Patriot Tab is the next generation in speed and ultra-portability. Micro-sized with the enhanced transfer speed of USB 3.0, the Tab is the best lifestyle solution for those looking for excellent performance in an ultra-light extremely portable storage device. Plug in the Patriot Tab and it becomes barely noticeable to fit with the look of any PC or laptop. Designed for excellent protection from heavy mobile use, the Patriot Tab features a durable heavy metal housing. The Tab is plug-and-play compatible and available in 8GB, 16GB, and 32GB capacities, so perfect for carrying your all your data wherever you go. The Patriot Tab is compatible with Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows ME, Linux 2.4 and later, Mac OS9, X and later. Backed by Patriot Memory's award winning customer service, the Tab comes with a 2-year warranty
title: Patriot 16GB Tab Series Micro-sized USB 3.0 Flash Drive With Up To 80MB/sec & Metal Housing - PSF16GTAB3USB
